April 8, 1957
/
Dr. Burton Paulu
Station K U 0 M
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
Haven’t seen or heard of your Waterman pen.
Sorry you lost it.
I see no reason why Ford would object to TV
management seminar. Also, see no reason why you shouldn t
appoint committee to get started on it. However, do
believe we should not have any public notice at the
monk.at, such as announcement.
I think the convention will work out all right.
We’ll just have to be a little definite at times. I
tried my best and kindest to explain this to Marguerite
the other day. Then comes a misunderstanding through
the mails, and a number of pages which won’t help to
get off dead center, but we can follow up at appropriate
time.
Incidentally, have written Dr. Faust both regarding
the TV seminar and about consultation with him* No reply
to either. He may have been out of town.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
